Sentencas: SOEC (Solid oxide electrolysis cell) has great potential to store unstable renewable energy in form of steady chemical energy.
Titulo: Dynamic electro-thermal modeling of co-electrolysis of steam and carbon dioxide in a tubular solid oxide electrolysis cell

Sentencas: For this application, transient behavior in variable working condition is crucial.
Titulo: Dynamic electro-thermal modeling of co-electrolysis of steam and carbon dioxide in a tubular solid oxide electrolysis cell

Sentencas: A 2D (two-dimensional) dynamic model was developed to predict the dynamic response of H2O/CO2 co-electrolysis in TSOEC (tubular solid oxide electrolysis cell).
Titulo: Dynamic electro-thermal modeling of co-electrolysis of steam and carbon dioxide in a tubular solid oxide electrolysis cell

Sentencas: The dynamic model comprehensively considered the macroscopic fluid flow, microscopic diffusion, heat transfer and electrochemical/chemical reactions in the TSOEC.
Titulo: Dynamic electro-thermal modeling of co-electrolysis of steam and carbon dioxide in a tubular solid oxide electrolysis cell

Sentencas: In this paper, the TNV (thermal neutral voltage) of TSOEC was specifically defined and calculated.
Titulo: Dynamic electro-thermal modeling of co-electrolysis of steam and carbon dioxide in a tubular solid oxide electrolysis cell

Sentencas: The time constants of charge/mass/heat transport processes were evaluated.
Titulo: Dynamic electro-thermal modeling of co-electrolysis of steam and carbon dioxide in a tubular solid oxide electrolysis cell

Sentencas: Further, the responses of current, gas concentrations, temperature, efficiency, conversions to electricity/gas flow/temperature step inputs were respectively studied.
Titulo: Dynamic electro-thermal modeling of co-electrolysis of steam and carbon dioxide in a tubular solid oxide electrolysis cell

Sentencas: Through the study, appropriate transient operations were designed to improve efficiency and conversions.
